attributes.action: Undertake a 2nd referendum on Europe Exit, now we have more truthful information
attributes.additional_details: There's 55,000 European NHS workers in England (FullFact). 10 years to replace EU nationals in the hospitality sector (Guardian). UK needs skilled tradespeople as UK kids, no longer see this as a viable career (Guardian and multiple). By isolating the UK from the rest of Europe, we are not only potentially facing an increase in costs for movement of goods, we are facing plunging the UK into a massive economic disaster. This needs to be halted for the sake of all businesses, UK wide.
attributes.background: The European Referendum was full of misinformation and mistruths. We, the British Public, now have a better idea of what European Exit means for us all. The cost will be billions of pounds; the divorce bill and the cost of amending legislation. Spend this on Education, Healthcare, Infrastructure.
